text: Balo -- ''ohe janagana! Ami niscaya'i allah‌ra rasula tomadera sabara kache, -- mahakasamandala o prthibira sarbabhaumatba yamra se'ijanera'i, tini chara an'ya upasya ne'i, tini jibana dana karena o mrtyu ghatana. Sejan'ya allah‌te bisbasa karo o tamra rasulera prati -- um'mi nabi, yini imana enechena allahate o tamra banisamuhe, ara tomara'o tamra anusarana karo yena tomara satpathaprapta hate paro.’’
